articles.content: (BoB) on Friday reported a 75.4% year-on-year (YoY) jump in its quarterly net profit to Rs 3,853 crore, its highest-ever, as compared to Rs 2,197 crore in the same quarter last year.Net Interest Inco… [+1663 chars]
